v-model:active-key.description: The key of the currently expanded panel
v-model:active-key.description_zh: 当前展开的面板的 key

:default-active-key.description: Key of the default expanded panel (uncontrolled mode)
:default-active-key.description_zh: 默认展开的面板的 key （非受控模式）

accordion.description: Whether accordion mode is turned on

show-expand-icon.description: Whether to display the expand icon

bordered.description: Whether or not to display a border

destroy-on-hide.description: Whether to destroy the content when hidden
destroy-on-hide.description_zh: 是否在隐藏时销毁内容

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the expanded panel changes
events.description_zh: 展开的面板发生改变时触发
